name: Time for Coffee Stocking Stuffer- GreenSleeves (tm) by Downstairs Designs No. 62-
description:
New from Downstairs Designs~~ GreenSleeves (tm) Reusable Coffee Cozy!

Help keep our landfills empty, don't waste all those little cardboard holders!

I designed this unique cozy myself, after months of working on different designs, to come up with one I think is perfect for everyone and every size coffee too!

Each GreenSleeve is one-of-a-kind, you will receive the exact item show in the photo. 

The GreenSleeve (tm) has a single nickel pearl snap, which is the key to my original design. This snap swivels, so when you have different size cups, it can expand or contract to fit perfectly! No more excess fabric like the fixed circle type cozies. It also is perfect to keep it ready for use- just snap it on to your handbag, tote, laptop case, bike handle etc. 

I also designed the GreenSleeve to fit more hands- I have big hands, so I never found sleeves wide enough to keep all my fingers protected, so I made it larger than most commercial sleeves. I use four (4!) layers of fabric for protection, too- heavy decorator linen on top, the same as used in the In Touch Clutch (tm). Linen or muslin is on the opposite side, a layer of flannel sandwiches these layers, and for the personal touch, a wide appliquéd patch of cottons and/or linens on the outside where your fingers wrap around.

name: Pirate Treasure Map DoodleMat Set
description:
For the first time ever, I am happy to be able to introduce online ordering of the chalkboard placemats you have seen over the years in shows and the farmer's markets!

Inventory changes weekly, so fabrics here today may be forever gone tomorrow as fabric go out of print.  

Please note that the photos will be stock photos- each mat is cut individually so the print may appear in different places, but will be the exact fabric shown.  Also, binding color and ribbons may be different as well- if this will bother you, please email BEFORE you purchase to get the available options. Thanks!

This doodle mat is a generous nearly 12" x 18", with high quality cotton fabric on one side, and chalkboard cloth on the other. The set comes with a matching eraser bag- simply turn inside out for the flannel eraser!  Flexible and portable, the mat rolls up and ties with a ribbon.

Little ones can use the cotton side for a placemat, especially useful in restaurants where the cleanliness of the table may be in question. Perfect for crackers, cereal, you name it. Make a mess and get the cotton dirty? No problem, the mat is completely machine washable.

Chalkboard surface can be wiped clean with a damp paper towel in everyday use, but if it gets dirty or a little grey from so much use, toss it in the wash! Brings the chalk surface back to life.

Bag comes with a pearl snap closure, and can also be thrown in the machine to clean as well.

Set includes:
XL Chalkboard placemat
Matching Eraser Bag
Instruction card

Great for car rides, restaurants, church, weddings, doctor's offices, waiting rooms...you name it!

Chalk is NOT included in the online sets, but may be purchased separately in the shop.

name: In Touch Clutch (tm) in Cinnamon Swirl
description:
..The In Touch Clutch (tm) is the perfect way to stay close to what you hold near and dear. On the train, in a waiting room, between meetings or classes, spare moments can add up to so much. Stay in touch by having cards and stamps at the ready, have your inspiration-filled journals at your side, your products ready to show at a moments notice...

..Made from heavy weight linen, interfaced for added form and accented with unique fabrics that fit your personality and needs. Accent fabric wraps inside to form small interior pockets, perfect for IDs, business cards, stamps and more. Two large pockets can hold every thing from cards to notebooks to pen sets, whatever you might need.

..Decorative topstitching also adds strength to the form. Two pearl snaps keep the envelope flap beautifully closed.

..Photos of each clutch are stock photos, therefore the exact placement of pattern may vary.

...Approximate dimensions: Closed, the clutch is about 6 inches wide and 8 inches tall. The main pocket interior is about 7.5 inches by 5 inches on each side. The small pockets are about 3.25 inches wide by 2 inches tall. Please remember all items are hand cut and hand made, slight variations in measurements and fabric placement are to be expected.

name: Gift Pack of GreenSleeves (tm) - 4 for the officemates
description:
New from Downstairs Designs~~ GreenSleeves (tm) Reusable Coffee Cozy!

Help keep our landfills empty, don't waste all those little cardboard holders!

I designed this unique cozy myself, after months of working on different designs, to come up with one I think is perfect for everyone and every size coffee too!

THIS LISTING: You are purchasing any FOUR GreenSleeve shown in the Shop Section GreenSleeves. You MUST add the names of the GreenSleeves you would like to purchase when you check out with this listing. 

Each GreenSleeve is one-of-a-kind, you will receive the exact item show in the photo. All props and additional cozies shown in photos not included. Convo if you are interested in another shown in the photos, or custom sets.

The GreenSleeve (tm) has a single nickel pearl snap, which is the key to my original design. This snap swivels, so when you have different size cups, it can expand or contract to fit perfectly! No more excess fabric like the fixed circle type cozies. It also is perfect to keep it ready for use- just snap it on to your handbag, tote, laptop case, bike handle etc. 

I also designed the GreenSleeve to fit more hands- I have big hands, so I never found sleeves wide enough to keep all my fingers protected, so I made it larger than most commercial sleeves. I use four (4!) layers of fabric for protection, too- heavy decorator linen on top, the same as used in the In Touch Clutch (tm). Linen or muslin is on the opposite side, a layer of flannel sandwiches these layers, and for the personal touch, a wide appliquéd patch of cottons and/or linens on the outside where your fingers wrap around.



Washable, stylish and endlessly reusable. A Practical Indulgence.
